amendment.description: Amendment provides $20 million to expand the U.S. training capacity for prosthetics and orthotics to the U.S. schools accredited by the National Commission on Orthotic and Prosthetic Education.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
